column2: Title
As an admin, I would like to manage foreign worker details.
As a director, I would like to manage the admin account.
Customer review for account management and calling VISA
As a user i would like to have a Log-In page
column14:
- Log-in information should be secure
- Prompt error message when invalid input
- Prompt message when Success Log-In 
- Easy to use log-in page
- Button to Sign-In 
- Show Current Date on Log-in Page 
- Simple Design for the Log-in Page

column2: As a director, I would like to add new admin.
column14:
- only director able to add new employee
- able to view the employee detail 
    The employee detail :
1) Employee ID
2) Employee Name
3) Contact Number
4) Age
5)Position
6)Status

column2: As an admin, I can edit the existed foreign worker details, so that all the details are accurate.
System must block user from entering duplicate new passport number into the new foreign worker record
As an admin, I can update all the relevant expired details, so that the expired date is up to date.
As an admin, I want to have calendar while update the expired date, so that my work can be easier
Admin see duplicate record in record preview after record entry
As an admin, I can upload worker's particular, so that I can preview back in future
column14:
-only can upload after the worker has been added into the system
-attachment files are saved according to worker's passport number
-particular include (passport photo,passport,special pass,PLKS,and insurans policy)
-jpg format (passport photo,passport,special pass,and PLKS)
-pdf format (passport,special pass,PLKS, insurans policy)
-passport and special pass can contain multiple files
-passport,special pass,PLKS, and insurans policy must have old and new version for preview

column2: As an admin, I can print out the attachment files
As an admin, I can download or save the attachment files
As an admin, I want to get expired date reminder based on remaining days
column14:
-when the expired date is less than 90 days, the reminder must be in green color
-when the expired date is less than 60 days, the reminder must be in yellow color
-when the expired date is less than 30 days, the reminder must be in orange color
-when the expired date is less than 0 day, the reminder must be in red color
